Relations.name: Nova Ara
Relations.what: A collaborative space station like the ISS (needs to be relaunched due to invalidation)

Relations.name: Ion Engine Tech Exchange
Relations.what: Infinix allows ssdcat to dock to their station to research ion engine technology and gain access to its use

Relations.name: Interplanetary comms support
Relations.what: ssdcat allows J3 Mângo to use their lunar comms to put their interplanetary communications satellite at a lagrange point and then he would let ssdcat use that afterwards.

Relations.name: Lunar comms support
Relations.what: ssdcat allows TheMacTester to use their lunar comms network.

Relations.name: Interplanetary comms exchange
Relations.what: TheMacTester allows ilikespace to use their interplanetary comms in exchange for him being able to dock and add modules to the Gaia-1 station
